content: Singaporean model **Pilar Carmelita Anastasia Arlando** (born 1 September 1989 in [Porto](/wiki/Porto), [Portugal](/wiki/Portugal))[*citation needed*] is a Singaporean model and beauty pageant titleholder who won the title of [Miss Singapore World](/wiki/Miss_Singapore_World) 2009. ## Biography Arlando was raised in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore).[*citation needed*] During the [Miss Singapore World](/wiki/Miss_Singapore_World) pageant, Arlando earned the 2nd Runner Up 2009/10 title, but took over from [Ris Low](/wiki/Ris_Low), who had to resign the title. Arlando went on to represent Singapore at the [Miss World 2009](/wiki/Miss_World_2009) Pageant, held in [Johannesburg, South Africa](/wiki/Johannesburg,_South_Africa) on 12 December 2009. She represented her nation as one of the top 12 for the Sports Fast Track Event. Arlando has been part of various charity events, and is particularly active for children with Down syndrome. - Her Determination - City-News-Singapore - Singapore-Contestant-MISSWORLD This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This biography article about an Asian contestant in a beauty pageant is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pilar Arlando
